en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
We’re sorry, we can’t seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
We’re sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: We’re sorry, we’ve lost your connection to the Jackbox Games servers.
en.TIMEOUT:
We’re sorry, we can’t seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.TIMEOUT_INTERNET:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: We’re sorry, the server has disconnected you. Please try again.
en.LOST_LICENSE: We’re sorry, we lost the license for this content!
en.STEAM_ERROR: We’re sorry, we couldn’t validate your Steam license.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: We’re sorry, we couldn’t validate your Twitch Prime license.
en.LOST_DLC: We’re sorry, the license for your DLC could not be found. Returning you to the menu...
en.LEGAL: Created & Developed by Jackbox Games, Inc. Game and Software © 2020 Jackbox Games, Inc. All rights reserved. Jackbox Games, Quiplash, and the Jackbox Games logo are registered trademarks of Jackbox Games, Inc. All other trademarks and logos are the property of their respective owners.
en.LEGAL_CRIWARE: Powered by "CRIWARE". CRIWARE is a trademark of CRI Middleware Co., Ltd.
en.LEGAL_FMOD: This product uses FMOD Sound System by Firelight Technologies
en.PS4_SAVE_SUB_TITLE: The say anything party game is back!
en.PS4_PSN_LOGOUT: You have been signed out of "PSN". "PSN" Sign-In is required\nfor online features. Please Sign-In to play!
en.PS4_USER_RESTRICTION: Sorry, you can’t proceed due to the parental controls.
en.PAUSE_PROGRESS_LOST: All current progress will be lost.
en.CONNECTING_DELAY:
This is taking a while…
Please check your internet connection.
en.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: on your mobile device to join in
en.POST_GAME_CHOICE_TITLE: What do you want to do now?
en.VOLUME_HOST_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for the host.
en.VOLUME_SFX_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for sound effects.
en.VOLUME_MUSIC_DESCRIPTION: Adjust the volume for the music.
en.AUDIENCE_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Turn ON to allow non-contestants to join and affect the game.
en.EXTENDED_TIMERS_DESCRIPTION: Enable very long timers. Recommended only for streamed games.
en.PASSWORD_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Generate a password that players must enter to join the game.
en.MODERATION_DESCRIPTION:
Generate a password that moderators must enter.
Moderators join game at mod.jackbox.tv.
en.TWITCH_REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: Require players to be logged into Twitch.
en.POSTGAME_SHARING_DESCRIPTION: Allow players to optionally share answers and scores from the game on social media.
en.FAMILY_FRIENDLY_DESCRIPTION: Turn ON to avoid the game’s more provocative content. To control player input, use MODERATION or the PROFANITY FILTER.
en.START_GAMEPAD_DESCRIPTION: Games must be started with controller, not from player devices.
en.HIDE_ROOM_CODE_DESCRIPTION: Allow the on-screen room code to be hidden.
en.MAX_PLAYERS_DESCRIPTION: Number of players that can join the game before people are added to the audience.
en.PLAYER_CONTENT_FILTERING_HATE_SPEECH_DES: Words used in hateful speech will cause input to be rejected. Profanity is allowed.
en.PLAYER_CONTENT_FILTERING_PROFANITY_DESCR: Words used in hateful speech and profanity will cause input to be rejected.
en.MOTION_SENSITIVITY_DESCRIPTION: Reduce motion sensitivity with less-animated backgrounds.
en.ON_YOUR_DEVICE: on your mobile device to join in
en.PICK_YOUR_FAVORITE: Pick your favorite on your device now!
en.PLAYERS_WHO_LIKE: of players who like your answer.
en.WRITE_ANSWERS_NOW: Write your answer on your device now!
en.YOUR_VOTES_WILL: Your votes will influence the game!
en.FINISH_PROMPT: Finish the prompt for this quip!
en.ERROR_CODE_ENTRY_TOO_LONG: Sorry your entry is too long.
en.ERROR_CODE_TOO_MANY_QUIPS: Sorry you already submitted all your quips.
en.CONTROLLER_PRESS_CANCEL: Press this button to cancel game start
en.CONTROLLER_POSTGAME_CHOICE: What do you want to do?
en.CONTROLLER_CANT_ENTER_SAME_THING: YOU ENTERED THE SAME THING AS SOMEONE ELSE!  TRY AGAIN.
en.CONTROLLER_AWARD_GOLD: AWARD YOUR GOLD MEDAL TO YOUR FAVORITE ANSWER
en.CONTROLLER_AWARD_BRONZE: AND HAND OUT YOUR BRONZE MEDAL TO YOUR THIRD FAVORITE
en.CONTROLLER_CUE_LOCATION: Write the name of a location
en.CONTROLLER_CUE_TITLE: Write the name of a title for a movie, song, TV show, etc.
en.CONTROLLER_CUE_PRODUCT: Write the name of a product
en.CONTROLLER_CUE_SAD_THING: Write the saddest thing you can think of
en.CONTROLLER_CUE_LOVED_ONE: Write the name of someone you love
en.CONTROLLER_CUE_DONT_DO_ALONE: Write something you wouldn’t do alone
en.CONTROLLER_CUE_MAKEOUT_SONG: Write the name a great makeout song
en.CONTROLLER_CUE_NEVER_EAT: Write the name something you’d never eat
en.CONTROLLER_CUE_UNFORGETABLE_PLACE: Write the name an unforgettable place to visit
en.CONTROLLER_CUE_BAD_LATE_EXCUSE: Write a bad excuse for being late
en.CONTROLLER_FINAL_ROUND_WRITE_QUIPS_DONE: You’re done. Please wait for the other players.
en.CONTROLLER_FINAL_ROUND_SORT_QUIPS_DONE: You’re done. Please wait for the other players.
en.CONTROLLER_FINAL_ROUND_SELECT_QUIP: Select your best quip for this prompt
en.CONTROLLER_FINAL_ROUND_SELECT_QUIP_DONE: You’re done. Please wait for the other players.
en.CONTROLLER_FINAL_ROUND_VOTE_QUIP_DONE: You’re done. Please wait for the other players.
en.CONTROLLER_FINAL_ROUND_SORT_QUIPS: Sort the quips (favorite on top) for this prompt
en.CONTROLLER_VOTE_AUTHOR_WAIT: You wrote this. Wait for other players to vote.
en.CONTROLLER_AUDIENCE_LOBBY_WAIT: You’re in the audience. Please wait for the game to start
en.CONTROLLER_AUDIENCE_WAIT_FOR_PLAYERS: You’re in the audience. Please wait for the players to complete their tasks.
en.CONTROLLER_FILTER_REJECTED_TEXT: I’m afraid you can’t write that. Please be respectful of other players.
en.TEXT_DESCRIPTION_VOTE_WINNER: The winning quip is "%s" by %s with %d percent of the vote.
en.TEXT_DESCRIPTION_VOTE_QUIPLASH: "%s" by %s got a quiplash with %d percent of the vote.
en.TEXT_DESCRIPTION_VOTE_SUPER_QUIPLASH: "%s" by %s got a super quiplash with %d percent of the vote.
en.SAFETY_QUIP_16: a moose on a ski lift
en.SAFETY_QUIP_46: enough melatonin to tranquilize a horse
en.SAFETY_QUIP_82: an army of plucky chimney sweeps
en.SAFETY_QUIP_105: going back in time and getting eaten by a dinosaur
en.SAFETY_QUIP_106: mason jar full of belly button lint
en.SAFETY_QUIP_118: Mr. Peanut's successful brother, Dr. Peanut
en.SAFETY_QUIP_119: a horse that just keeps goin'
en.SAFETY_QUIP_121: the largest baby you've ever seen
en.SAFETY_QUIP_122: hair of the dog, tongue of a cat
en.SAFETY_QUIP_123: a guy who asks "Working hard or hardly working?"
en.SAFETY_QUIP_124: a nice weekend at the lake
en.SAFETY_QUIP_138: innocent looking town with a dark secret
en.SAFETY_QUIP_139: realizing who the killer was a moment too late
en.SAFETY_QUIP_141: eating nothing but cheeseburgers for 20 years
en.SAFETY_QUIP_142: what happens if you offend a witch
en.SAFETY_QUIP_146: a fanny pack full of mints
en.SAFETY_QUIP_147: a construction crane lifting you 20 stories in the air
en.SAFETY_QUIP_148: eating sliced deli meat straight from the bag
en.SAFETY_QUIP_151: screaming at an airline on social media
en.SAFETY_QUIP_152: the enormous meteor heading for Earth
en.SAFETY_QUIP_156: the finest meal in the world
en.CONTROLLER_UGC_TOS_WARNING: By sharing content, you agree to our Terms of service
en.CONTROLLER_UGC_CREATE_NEW_NAME_PROMPT: first things first, enter a name for the episode that will contain all your prompts and hit create.
en.CONTROLLER_UGC_DELETE_WARNING: Are you sure you want to delete this episode?
en.CONTROLLER_UGC_VIP_LOCKED: episode is locked while %s is deciding what to do
en.CONTROLLER_UGC_VIP_TITLE: waiting for %s to name episode, maybe tell them to hurry up!
en.CONTROLLER_UGC_VIP_WAITING: waiting for %s to choose what to do
en.CONTROLLER_UGC_VIP_EPISODES_WARNING: Warning: user generated content is not rated
en.CONTROLLER_UGC_INVALID_EPISODE_ID: Invalid User Content ID "%s". Please check and try again.
en.CONTROLLER_UGC_PSN_USERS: PSN USERS CAN ONLY PLAY CONTENT CREATED BY OTHER PSN USERS
en.CONTROLLER_UGC_SERVER_ERROR: Server error, please try again later.
en.CONTROLLER_UGC_NOT_COMPATIBLE: Sorry, the UGC episode %s is not compatible with this version of the game.
en.CONTROLLER_UGC_BLOCKED_USER: Cannot play content from blocked player : %s
en.UGC_ONCE_YOU_LOG_IN: Once you have logged in, you can:
en.UGC_USER_GENERATED_EPISODES: User generated episodes not rated. Proceed with caution.
en.UGC_PROMPT_LIMIT: You’ve reached the limit on prompts. Delete some to add more.
en.UGC_FEATURED_DESCRIPTION: Custom content made in-game just for you!
en.UGC_FEATURED_NO_CONTENT: No featured content at this time.
